metadata.title: CVE-2017-12143 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: In libquicktime 1.2.4, an allocation failure was found in the functionquicktime_read_info in lqt_quicktime.c, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libquicktime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
